FuncDef: The reset cpu-defend hostcar statistics command clears Host-CAR statistics.
CLIs: reset cpu-defend hostcar { <car-id> | all | auto-adjust | dropped | non-dropped } statistics slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Clear statistics based on a specific host CAR ID.
The value is an integer in the range 0 to 32767.

Clears the IDs of CAR rules in which the bandwidth values are automatically adjusted.
-

Clears statistics about packets in which some bytes are dropped.
-

Clears statistics in which the passed packet traffic is not 0 and the discarded packet traffic is 0.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The reset cpu-defend car-type statistics command allows you to clear statistics about a specific Host-CAR or clear all Host-CAR statistics.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
